medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days ago with mild onset yesterday, escalating to severe sharp and constant pain this morning. Patient reports nausea with non-bilious non-bloody emesis 4 times. Pain alleviated with Advil. Denies fever but reports chills.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gastrointestinal disorders and cancers. Grandmother developed lung cancer, was smoker.
